summary: The script automates the acquisition and preparation of the AIShell-3 speech corpus for text‑to‑speech training. It handles downloading the archive, extracting its contents, normalizing and converting Chinese transcripts, pairing them with audio files, and writing the resulting metadata (e.g., file paths, normalized text) to a JSON manifest.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use, clean dataset for building and evaluating TTS models on Mandarin speech data.
